title: "D-Link R15 Eagle Pro AI AX1500 Smart Router launched in India"
excerpt: "D-Link has launched its new router in India. Called the R15 Eagle Pro AI AX1500 Smart Router, it supports Wi-Fi 6 technology and comes with AI enabled features. The router is compatible with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa."
